name: Grapple Gun Gomez
description:
Grapple Gun Gomez is a demo designed for Webster University's World Design course and features many mechanics I'd love to implement in a future project.

Have fun, hop up a mountain, and see if you can find the octopus.

Controls:

  • Move: W, A, S, D
  • Jump: Spacebar
  • Fire Grappling Gun: Left Mouse
